heading: About the Global C-suite Study
paragraphs: The Global C-suite Study is an ongoing series the IBM Institute for Business Value developed in 2003. Every couple of years, we interview C-suite executives in 20 industries around the world to understand their points of view about technology trends, their business priorities, and the key issues theyâ€™re facing.

As of our latest C-suite Study, we have collected data and insights from more than 50,000 interviews. Each new C-suite Study we publish is authored in collaboration with academics, futurists, and technology visionaries.
